samples.question: So, what are the advantages and disadvantages of being busy?
samples.transcript: So for being busy, the advantage is you can push yourself maybe get out of your comfort zone instead of maybe lying on your bed or watching some you know rubbish TV series or movies in your house. samples.question: Do you think it is good for children to be busy?
samples.transcript: I would say definitely not. samples.question: How does technology help with time management?
samples.transcript: Maybe you can put all of your plans on your on your phone. Then this way you can see what kind of plans you have today. samples.question: What is your favorite type of food?

samples.question: You prefer texting or calling?
